sentences.sContent: Please bring me some wrapping paper regarding as you go to the mall so that I can pack up the gift for Bill's birthday. 6. Always wear your seat belt.
sentences.sCn: 如果你去商店的话，请帮我带一些包装纸来，以便我可以把给Bill的生日礼物包起来。

trans.tranOther: to put your possessions into a bag, etc. before leaving a place
